text: Need Riley Evans for Nando's campaign. Budget around $23,169, looking for 1 x YouTube short, 2 x Media interview, 1 x Product photography, 1 x Media interview, 2 x Twitter post. 5 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 11 months. Engagement period: 4 months. Need to sort out: TBC on final dates
